snippet: Higher taxes on investment income must be on the table for serious budget talks.
abstract: Editorial maintains that Republicans must be willing to close loophole that places super-low tax rates on investment income, which flows mainly to rich, as part of negotiations to avoid fiscal cliff; argues that raising taxes on investment income is necessary to generate much-needed revenue that will bring down the deficit.
lead_paragraph: Higher taxes on investment income must be on the table for serious budget talks.

headline.seo: The Other Tax Breaks for the Rich
headline.main: The Other Tax Breaks for the Rich
headline.print_headline: The Other Tax Breaks for the Rich
